rod.description: Harvey's Allcocks Harvey Torbett split cane rod

success.message: You expertly assemble your Allcocks Harvey Torbett rod. The honey-colored bamboo gleams in the morning light.

failure.message: The rod sections refuse to fit together properly. After ten minutes of wrestling, you realize you've been trying to attach the handle to itself.

examine.message: Harvey's Allcocks Harvey Torbett split cane rod gleams in the light, a testament to fine British craftsmanship.

success.message: Miraculous! Harvey executes a perfect cast, the line unfurling like poetry in motion!

eat.message: Harvey examines his rod thoughtfully. 'While bamboo is technically edible, I suspect this particular specimen would be rather expensive roughage.'

success.message: The fly attaches with surgical precision. Your knot would make a sailor weep with envy.

failure.message: After twenty minutes of creative cursing, you've tied seventeen knots, none involving the fly.

examine.message: The fly is a masterpiece of the tier's art - delicate feathers and precise construction designed to fool the most discerning trout.

eat.message: Harvey considers the fly thoughtfully. 'While technically protein, I believe this particular morsel is better suited to aquatic rather than human consumption. Also, it took me 2 hours to make.'

cast.message: Harvey attempts to cast the fly by hand. It travels approximately eighteen inches before landing with all the grace of a confused moth.

eat.message: You enjoy a perfectly adequate sandwich. The cucumber is crisp, the butter properly applied. For a moment, all is right with the world.

examine.message: A properly constructed cucumber sandwich - crusts removed, butter applied with mathematical precision. Mother would be proud.

cast.message: In a moment of desperation, Harvey hurls his sandwich into the water. It lands with a pathetic splash. 'Good God, what have I done? That was my lunch!' The ducks seem pleased with this development.

attach.message: Harvey attempts to attach his sandwich to the fishing line. 'Perhaps the trout prefer traditional British cuisine?' The sandwich dangles wetly, looking deeply offended.

tea_discovery.message: Harvey takes a satisfying sip of {thermos_contents.name}. Proper tea makes everything more manageable.

brandy_discovery.message: Harvey takes a sip and his eyes widen in delighted surprise! 'Good heavens! Grandfather's emergency brandy! How wonderfully unexpected!'

examine.message: The thermos has seen many fishing expeditions. Harvey wonders what delights await within.

cast.message: Harvey hurls his thermos into the water in a fit of angling madness! It lands with a tremendous splash. 'Oh blast! My tea!' He immediately begins calculating the trajectory for a rescue mission.

attach.message: Harvey attempts to attach his thermos to the fishing line. 'Perhaps I can create the world's first beverage-based angling system!' The thermos dangles precariously, looking like a very confused depth charge.

examine.message: A proper gentleman's fishing hat, weathered by many expeditions and decorated with the occasional fly that missed its target.

eat.message: Harvey eyes his hat speculatively. 'While felt is technically organic, I suspect my milliner would be deeply offended. Also, it tastes of river water and disappointment.'

cast.message: Harvey hurls his hat into the water like a fabric frisbee! 'Take that, you aquatic scoundrels!' The hat floats away with wounded dignity while Harvey immediately regrets this decision.

attach.message: Harvey attempts to attach his hat to the fishing line. 'Perhaps the fish will mistake it for an enormous, fashionable insect!' The hat dangles wetly, looking deeply undignified.

water.description: The flowing water of the river

examine.message: The water flows with the kind of purposeful determination Harvey wishes he possessed.

drink.message: Harvey cups some river water in his hands and takes a tentative sip. 'Hmm. Notes of limestone, hints of watercress, with a lingering finish of... is that duck?'

eat.message: Harvey contemplates the philosophical impossibility of eating water. 'One cannot consume that which flows through one's fingers, much like success in angling.'

duck.description: A local duck observing Harvey's angling attempts

examine.message: The duck watches Harvey's angling efforts with what appears to be professional interest mixed with mild concern for his mental state.

eat.message: Harvey eyes the duck thoughtfully. 'While duck Ã  l'orange is delightful, I suspect this particular specimen would be considerably improved by proper preparation. Also, it's still using its legs.'

attach.message: Harvey approaches the duck with his fishing line. 'Perhaps you'd care to assist in this angling endeavor?' The duck gives him a look that suggests it has serious concerns about his mental state.

cast.message: Harvey makes throwing motions at the duck, who regards this with the disdain of a creature that has seen many frustrated anglers. The duck paddles away, shaking its head sadly.

boot.description: An old boot that Harvey has somehow caught

examine.message: A waterlogged boot of mysterious provenance. Harvey wonders about its previous owner and whether they're hopping around somewhere looking for it.

eat.message: Harvey examines the boot with scholarly interest. 'While leather is technically edible after proper preparation, I suspect this particular specimen has been marinating in river water for rather too long.'

cast.message: Harvey hurls the boot back into the water with considerable force. 'Return to your watery domain!' It lands with a satisfying splash. At least something went where it was supposed to today.

attach.message: Harvey attempts to attach the boot to his line. 'Perhaps I can create the world's first footwear-based angling system!' The boot dangles wetly, looking like a very confused depth charge.

fish.description: A fish (if Harvey has actually caught one)

examine.message: A magnificent specimen! Harvey admires its sleek form and wonders if it appreciates the scholarly precision that led to its capture.

eat.message: Harvey eyes the fish thoughtfully. 'While sushi is fashionable, I believe this particular specimen would benefit enormously from proper cooking. Also, it's still looking at me.'

cast.message: Harvey hurls the fish back into the water! 'Return to your aquatic studies!' The fish disappears with what might have been a grateful flick of its tail. Harvey immediately wonders if he's made a terrible mistake.

examine.message: The notebook contains Harvey's meticulous observations on angling theory, fish psychology, and the philosophical implications of recreational failure.

eat.message: Harvey considers his notebook. 'While the leather binding might provide some nutrition, I suspect my research notes would prove rather indigestible. Also, this represents thirty years of scholarly observation.'

cast.message: Harvey hurls his notebook into the water! 'Perhaps the fish will appreciate my research!' The notebook lands with a splash, its pages fluttering like the wings of a dying academic bird. Harvey immediately realizes the magnitude of his error.

attach.generic_response: Harvey cannot attach {object} - it's either already attached, inappropriate for attachment, or has strong opinions about being attached to things.

examine.generic_response: Harvey examines {object} with scholarly interest, making mental notes for future reference.

cast.generic_response: Harvey hurls {object} with the desperation of a man who has run out of conventional options. The results are predictably chaotic.

eat.generic_response: Harvey considers eating {object} but decides that even his current circumstances don't justify such culinary desperation.

drink.generic_response: Harvey cannot drink {object} - it's either not liquid, not potable, or has already been consumed by local wildlife.

cast_mishaps: Your cast goes awry, landing in a nearby bush. The bush seems offended.
The line tangles mid-cast, creating a three-dimensional puzzle that would challenge Stephen Hawking.
Your cast achieves new heights of creative failure, somehow hooking your own hat.
The fly line develops sentience and wraps itself around everything except what you intended.
Your cast defies several laws of physics, creating a temporal paradox.
successful_catches: Extraordinary! A magnificent trout rises to your fly! Harvey's academic theories are vindicated!
Success! A beautiful grayling takes the bait, clearly impressed by Harvey's scholarly approach!
Triumph! A fish of considerable intelligence has chosen to engage in this aquatic discourse!
unusual_catches: You reel in... a boot. It's not even a matching pair with the one you caught yesterday.
Success! You've caught a magnificent... stick. The stick appears unimpressed by your angling prowess.
You reel in what might be the world's most philosophical piece of pond weed.
A soggy newspaper emerges from the depths, featuring yesterday's cricket scores.
You've successfully caught a rubber duck. It squeaks accusingly.
An old tin can surfaces, containing what appears to be a strongly worded letter to the River Authority.
You reel in a small traffic cone. Harvey wonders how it got there and whether he should report it to the authorities.
A waterlogged teddy bear emerges from the depths, looking like it has seen things that cannot be unseen.
note_taking_activities: Harvey carefully documents the precise angle of that last catastrophic cast for his upcoming paper on 'Geometric Failures in Fly Fishing.'
You sketch the trajectory of your fly line, noting its remarkable resemblance to a Fibonacci spiral gone wrong.
Harvey records detailed observations about the apparent intelligence of local waterfowl.
You begin drafting a footnote about the philosophical implications of fishing in a universe with other plans.
brandy_responses_merry: Harvey feels considerably more optimistic about his angling prospects! *slight wobble*
The world seems a much more reasonable place after that delightful discovery!
Harvey begins humming a jaunty tune while adjusting his equipment with renewed vigor.
brandy_responses_jolly: Harvey declares this to be 'absolutely the finest day for fishing in recorded history!' *hic*
Everything seems wonderfully amusing to Harvey right now, including his own fishing technique.
Harvey begins composing what he believes to be brilliant poetry about the nature of angling.
brandy_responses_tipsy: Harvey is having the most marvelous time and wants everyone to know it! *hic*
The fish are clearly his very best friends, just playing a delightful game of hide and seek!
Harvey attempts to lecture a passing duck on the finer points of academic methodology.

escalate_chaos.description: Increase mishap level and reduce stats

add_fish_to_catch.description: Add a real fish to the catch list

add_unusual_to_catch.description: Add an unusual item to the catch list
